breed.description: The Arabian horse is one of the oldest and most recognizable horse breeds in the world. Known for its endurance and agility, it has a distinctive head shape and high tail carriage.
The Thoroughbred is a breed best known for its use in horse racing. They are known for their speed, agility, and spirit, making them one of the most popular horse breeds worldwide.
Clydesdales are a breed of draft horse known for their large size and strength. They are often used for heavy work and are famous for their distinctive feathering on the lower legs.
